actions.description: The reaper makes two dagger attacks and uses Shroud Self.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: The reaper magically turns invisible until the start of its next turn. This invisibility ends if the reaper makes an attack roll, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.
actions.name: Shroud Self

actions.description:
The reaper's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: charm person, disguise self, sanctuary
actions.name: Innate Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: As long as the reaper is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.
specialTraits.name: Aura of Murder
